record.name: Chart
record.description: The chart record is used to define the location and size of a chart.
record.author: Glen Stampoultzis (glens at apache.org)

field.name: x
field.description: x position of top-left corner (specified on 1/72 of an inch, two bytes are a whole and two are a fraction)

field.name: y
field.description: y position of top-left corner (specified on 1/72 of an inch, two bytes are a whole and two are a fraction)

field.name: width
field.description: width of chart (specified on 1/72 of an inch), two bytes are a whole and two are a fraction

field.name: height
field.description: height of chart (specified on 1/72 of an inch), two bytes are a whole and two are a fraction
